about_the_game:
Archipelago is a one-of-a-kind survival simulator with sandbox, trading and RPG elements, in a medieval fantasy setting.

Your ship is wrecked and you find yourself on one of the islands of the archipelago. Get the first resources to make stone weapons, tools and a simple raft. Then the whole Archipelago opens up in front of you. You need to move north to reach the continent and escape.

Game Features:
1. Mine a lot of resources and recycle them.
2. Create weapons, clothes, food, various accessories and more.
3. Construct useful buildings for crafting, mining, defense, or travel.
4. Travel by raft, boat, or ship between the many islands of the archipelago.
5. Fight over 200 types of enemies, including humans, animals, and monsters.
6. Interact with several neutral factions. You can trade with them, complete quests, or fight and pillage.
7. Use any of the 11 weapon categories, including magic.

The game is in development. We present a free demo version so you can evaluate our work and give feedback. There may be some bugs during the game, but most of the features work fine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core processor such as Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon RX 560 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Survival simulator on an archipelago of islands. Sandbox with a huge open world. Over 300 different items and resources, over 100 different enemies and NPCs. Elements of trade and RPG.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Indonesian, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
